data.fullContent: Toxic animals usually warn predators that they are not good food. There's no point in being toxic unless it helps survival and reproduction. The underside of these newts is vividly colored a yellow-orange. When a threat appears, the newt curls up its tail and lifts its head to show the warning color. This can be seen in photographs.
data.answer: 有毒的动物通常警告捕食者它们不是好食物。毒性没有任何意义，除非它有助于生存和繁殖。这些蝾螈的底部涂上鲜艳的橙黄色。当威胁出现时，蝾螈会卷起尾巴，抬起头，表现出警告的颜色。这可以从照片上看出来。
